readingMnemonic: ぼく is one of the common ways to say "I" in Japanese (which you should remember!). In this case, you're a boy... a cowboy, and you say, "<reading>ぼく</reading>will take these cows out to pasture!"
meaningMnemonic: A <radical>cow</radical> in the <radical>winter</radical> doesn't like to leave the barn to go to the <kanji>pasture</kanji>. It has to, though, because a cow's gotta eat.
